result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gerrico D Holt

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: and notice of DNA and witness list - State's
Status conference on November 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Information was E-filed with the court and a copy was given to the defendant; Defendant waived reading of Information; Defendant pleas not guilty, Court enters plea of Not Guilty; motions due in 20 days; bail continued.

3:40 PM Court reporter Rowan Thompson. Defendant Gerrico D Holt in court, in custody.  Attorney Crystal Vera in court for Gerrico D Holt. Attorney Valerian Powell in court for State of Wisconsin. Witness S.C. duly sworn and testified. Direct by State. Venue established. Defendant identified. Cross by Atty Vera. State moves for bind over, waives argument. Defense objects to bind over, gives argument. State givew rebuttal argument. Court finds probable cause and binds over to branch 14.

ADDRESS INFO for Gerrico D Holt
Current: c/o DCJ,   (Effective: 09-12-2022)
Prior: 1819 Aberg Ave, Madison, WI 53704

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with BD & TD or any of the victim's immediate family members.
- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
Parties did not stipulate to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial Judge - Br 14

2:11 PM Defendant Gerrico D Holt in court, in custody.  Attorney Diana Maria Van Rybroek in court for Gerrico D Holt.  Prosecuting attorney Tomas Fernando Valerio in court for the State of Wisconsin. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts. Victims appeared and made statement via zoom.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 20, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
